comments.body: none of the links work - they all points to api/org/apache/lucene rather than api/core/org/apache/lucene

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.body:
I've gotten the majority of this done.

I'm still on the lookout for dead links and what not - but most things are in working order from what I can tell.

description:
ugg - a fun one - my brain is sliding to the bottom of my skull from excitement.

Must update all of the site level pages to current API usage.
